title: Jordan Peterson vs Sam Harris - reflections. With new Jordan Peterson interview
description:
This podcast features brand new content from our recent interview with Jordan Peterson. Using parts of it as a jumping off point, David and Alexander discuss the Sam Harris / Jordan Peterson events and analyse the most recent debate to explore the tensions between scientism, religious revelation and politics. 

We also introduce our theme for next week, 'What the Left can learn from Peterson', discuss the Intellectual Dark Web, and give some updates on the content coming up from our recent trip to the US.

Visit our Podbean page to download Rebel Wisdom as an audio podcast: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com
 
'Jordan Peterson: Truth in the Time of Chaos': https://youtu.be/EjqXXengN1s

Jordan Peterson & Christianity with Paul VanderKlay: https://youtu.be/o1OMqErdDGk

Rebel Wisdom is a platform for the biggest ideas around. 
http://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/

To help us make more of these films, please consider sponsoring us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom
